title: Yellowish tint of display on Pixel 4
content:
Hello!

I have already read several posts describing the yellow tint problem. But I din`t find solution of the problem. I tried to switch colours to "bright" and "natural" in settings, but it didn`t help. I sent feedback 2 times, there is no any response.
Even my old Xiaomi does way better with colour accuracy.
So, does anyone already fix it and how to fix it?
(Sorry for my english)
